| ```
@dataclass
classGraphRunContext(Generic[StateT, DepsT]):
"""Context for a graph."""
  # TODO: Can we get rid of this struct and just pass both these things around..?
  state: StateT
"""The state of the graph."""
  deps: DepsT
"""Dependencies for the graph."""

```
